dt-example.title: ISO 8601 (with date picker)
dt-example.info:
This example mirrors the [DataTables ISO 8601 detection example](https://datatables.net/examples/datetime/iso8601.html), showing DataTables correctly ordering data in ISO 8601 format automatically.
ColumnControl also works with this automatic type detection, presenting a search input that is specific to dates (see the _Start date_ column in the table below). Note that when clicking on the input a date picker is shown for ease of use. This is done automatically if [the DataTables DateTime library](https://datatables.net/extensions/datetime/) is included on the page.
